a.title: YMCA - Preschool Before and Aftercare Information

li.a: YMCA - Preschool Before and Aftercare Information

span.img: WELCOME TO OUR WEBSITE! THIS IS THE PLACE TO COME FOR ALL YOUR SCHOOL INFORMATION. BOOK MARK IT AND CHECK IT FREQUENTLY FOR ALL THE LATEST UPDATES, PHOTOS AND INFORMATION, AS WELL AS UPCOMING EVENTS. WE STRONGLY BELIEVE THAT THE HOME AND SCHOOL CONNECTION IS VITAL FOR CHILD DEVELOPMENT AND ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT MY OFFICE WITH ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS.

span.span: Please click the link below to view the updated letter to parents regarding COVID-19
Please click on the link below:

The Blairstown Township Board of Education has a vacancy of an unexpired term. Eligible candidates must have been residents of Blairstown or Hardwick Township for at least one year. Additional requirements include candidates be registered to vote, be able to read and write, and be U.S. citizens.
Candidates may not hold office as mayor or member of the municipal governing body, nor may they have any interest in any contract with, or claim against, the Board of Education.

Letters of interest for those who want to fill the position through December 2022 can reply by April 24th to: Mrs. Molly Petty, Blairstown Township BOE, PO Box E, Blairstown, NJ 07825. Please call 362-8536 with questions.

div.a: Letter to parents of children who receive special education services

span.span: Please click on the attached link to view this important information.

div.a: Pre K and Kindergarten registration is now open!

span.span: Registration packets are available for parents and/or guardians for download from the Blairstown Elementary School website by clicking on the links below. If you do not have access to download, please contact Mrs. Colomba Kampfe (908-362-6111 ext 102) in the Administration Office to request a registration packet via mail. In order to schedule a screening appointment, the completed registration packet and mandatory documents must be submitted to Mrs. Kampfe.

div.a: Please click on the link below

p.strong: In partnership with home and community, Blairstown Elementary School is dedicated to the mission of providing an engaging and comprehensive education.
A passion for learning is ignited through an enriched learning environment. While celebrating individuality, our students develop confidence, competence and character.
All students have the opportunity to achieve their highest potential on a quest of lifelong learning to succeed in a global, 21st century.
BOE Meetings are held in the Blairstown Elementary School Library @ 7 PM
